NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WinForms.​ToastNotifier
Form
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WinForms.​ToastNotifier

Like a notification ballon, but more reliable "toast" because it slowly goes up, then down.  Subscribe to the Click even to know if the user clicked on it.
